title: Wrong Preseason rewards
body:
So when I transferred my account to OCE (During the free transfer promotion) , all of the games I had played on my old server SEA (South East Asia) was wiped. And I am FAIRLY certain that my account has over 2,500 hours in normal games alone if my progress wasn't wiped. Could a Rioter please look into this and check because I feel a bit cheated that I'm not getting the conqueror emote considering I've played since the start of Season 2.

Another issue is I don't believe I've received the adequate amount of blue essence to compensate for the Runes and Rune pages changes. Having had 14 Rune pages and basically every rune in the game that was viable, the total amount of blue essence for compensation I was given was under 8000 blue essence. A bit stingy considering I spent countless hours grinding out 14 runepages worth of IP and even more grinding out most of the viable runes.

IF a Rioter could look into this, it would be greatly appreciated. Thanks!

replies.body:
Hey Ringbear

That does sound strange and definitely something that is worth looking at.   First up I'd suggest initially that it might be best to get a support ticket in, so we can track this properly.   The same goes for anyone else who might read this and be in a similar situation (one-off transfer from SEA).

I'll also see what I can find out about it, but it might take a few days to track down.

Cheers
Mindstar
I'll do that as soon as possible. Thanks!

Hey Ringbear

I checked in on this, there is a plan to make sure that folks who transferred in from SEA are taken care of, but it might take a week or two to get in place as there are quite a few things to get through with end of season and preseason kicking off.  You've not been forgotten though!

Cheers
Mindstar
